item.title: Katips-theatre
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina

to UP Theater

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2-Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Magsaysay Ave Gate

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building (white) on the left.

Romulo Hall

The jeep will then pass by Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. The jeep will then turn right at E. Ma. Guerrero St.

Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

Parish of the Holy Sacrifice

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

UP Shopping Center

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

Kalayaan Residence Hall

You'll then see Kalayaan Residence Hall along Roces St.

Yakal Residence Hall

You'll also pass by the side of Yakal Residence Hall.

Melchor Hall (Engg)

The jeep will also pass by the side of Melchor Hall (College of Engineering) before turning right at Osmena Ave.

Carillon

The jeep will also pass by notable UP landmarks such as the UP Carillon.

UP Theater

Right next to the Carillon is the UP Theater. Ask to be dropped off the waiting shed some meters in front of the University Theater (Villamor Hall).
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Katips-fi
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina

to UP Film Institute (FI)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2-Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Magsaysay Ave Gate

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building(white) on the left.

Romulo Hall Waiting Shed

Alight the jeep at Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. Go to the Romulo Hall Waiting Shed along E. Ma. Guerrero Road, then ride the next Ikot Jeep that passes by.

Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

Parish of the Holy Sacrifice

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the Parish of the Holy Sacrifice (UP Chapel).

UP Shopping Center

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

Kalayaan Residence Hall

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St. where you'll see the Kalayaan Residence Hall.

Molave Residence Hall

The jeep then turns right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay St.

Bahay ng Alumni

Alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. This is located on the same side of the road you're in.

UP Film Institute (FI)

Cross the street to get to the UP Film Institute. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Film Institute is at your 11 o’clock.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Katips-cal
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina to College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2-Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Magsaysay Ave Gate

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building (white) on the left.

Romulo Hall

The jeep will then pass by Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. The jeep will then turn right at E. Ma. Guerrero St.

Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

Parish of the Holy Sacrifice

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

UP Shopping Center

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

Kalayaan Residence Hall

You'll then see Kalayaan Residence Hall along Roces St.

Yakal Residence Hall

You'll also pass by the side of Yakal Residence Hall.

Melchor Hall (Engg)

The jeep will also pass by the side of Melchor Hall (College of Engineering) before turning right at Osmena Ave.

Carillon

The jeep will also pass by notable UP landmarks such as the UP Carillon.

Oblation Plaza

The jeep will proceed along the Academic Oval and pass by the Oblation Plaza.

Vargas Museum

From the Oblation it will pass by the Vargas Museum. Prepare to get off as the jeep is now very close to Palma Hall.

Faculty Center (FC)



Right next to the Vargas Museum is the Faculty Center (FC).

Faculty Center (FC) Waiting Shed

Step off from the jeep at the Faculty Center (FC) waiting shed beside Vargas Museum.

Walk back in the direction of Vargas Museum then make a left turn as you reach the service road beside FC.

College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

Finally, head toward the nude female statue, Magdangal. Looming behind her is the College of Arts and Letters building.

If you’re running late and there’s too much traffic:

The Faculty Center jeepney stop is one of the last stops of the UP-Katipunan jeep inside UP before the jeep goes back to Katipunan again.

If you do not have time to spare (10-15 minutes before call time), alight at the foot bridge along Katipunan Avenue connecting the old UP Integrated School compound to the main campus. There is a lesser known pedestrian entrance here marked by a guard house. You are essentially at the side of UP College of Home Economics (Alonso Hall).

Cross the foot bridge, go through the pedestrian entrance, and make a run for it. You only need to run straight toward Palma Hall, turn right at Roces Street and turn left at the parking space (near Landbank) going to the College of Arts and Letters. Aja!

and College of Business Administration(BA)

Marikina

LRT2-Katipunan

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building (white) on the left.

Romulo Hall Waiting Shed

Alight from the jeep at Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. Head towards the Academic Oval by walking down E. Ma. Guerrero St. The School of Economics and the College of Business Administration are on the same block as Romulo Hall.

School of Economics (Econ)

Facing the academic oval, the School of Economics (Econ) follows Romulo Hall.

College of Business Administration (CBA)

The College of Business Administration (BA) is right next to Econ.

item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Katips-cal
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina to College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the barker before boarding.

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS (Manila Water).Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building (white) on the left.





The jeep will take a long route through the campus so prepare to warm your seat. It will pass by establishments such as the UP Health Service, and University Shopping Center, as well as several dormitories.

The jeep will also pass by notable UP landmarks such as the UP Carillon.

The jeep will proceed along the Academic Oval and pass by the Oblation plaza.

From the Oblation it will pass by the Vargas Museum. Prepare to get off as the jeep is now very close to the College of Arts and Letters.

Faculty Center waiting shed



Step off from the jeep at the Faculty Center (FC) beside Vargas Museum.

Walk back in the direction of Vargas Museum then make a left turn as you reach the service road beside FC.

College of Arts and Letters

Finally, head toward the nude female statue, Magdangal. Looming behind her is the College of Arts and Letters building.

If you’re running late and there’s too much traffic:

The Faculty Center jeepney stop is one of the last stops of the UP-Katipunan jeep inside UP before the jeep goes back to Katipunan again.

If you do not have time to spare (10-15 minutes before call time), alight at the foot bridge along Katipunan Avenue connecting the old UP Integrated School compound to the main campus. There is a lesser known pedestrian entrance here marked by a guard house. You are essentially at the side of UP College of Home Economics.

Cross the foot bridge, go through the pedestrian entrance, and make a run for it. You only need to run straight toward Palma Hall, turn right at Roces Street and turn left at the parking space (near Landbank) where going to the College of Arts and Letters. Aja!

The jeep will also pass by notable UP landmarks such as the UP Carillon.

Vargas Museum

From the Oblation it will pass by the Vargas Museum. Prepare to get off as the jeep is now very close to Palma Hall.

Faculty Center (FC)

The jeep will pass by the Faculty Center (FC).

Palma Hall (AS)

There are waiting sheds on both sides of Palma Hall (more popularly known as AS).

You may alight at the Faculty Center (FC) waiting shed near the Palma Hall east wing.

Alternatively, you may also alight at the next stop located near the Palma Hall west wing.

If you’re running late and there’s too much traffic:

The Faculty Center jeepney stop is one of the last stops of the UP-Katipunan jeep inside UP before the jeep goes back to Katipunan again.

There is a lesser known pedestrian entrance here marked by a guard house. You are essentially at the side of UP College of Home Economics (Alonso Hall).

Cross the foot bridge, go through the pedestrian entrance, and make a run for it. You only need to run straight toward Palma Hall from here. Aja!

Carillon

The jeep will also pass by notable UP landmarks such as the UP Carillon.

Oblation Plaza

The jeep will proceed along the Academic Oval and pass by the Oblation Plaza.

Arki Shed

Get off from the jeep at the first waiting shed right after the jeep passes by the Oblation. This waiting shed marks the intersection of Roxas Ave and E. Delos Santos St.

From the waiting shed, walk along E. Delos Santos St with the Oblation statue behind you. Only a few meters ahead is another intersection. Continue walking along E. Delos Santos St toward the UP Press Office.

College of Architecture (Arki)

The College of Architecture, a building known to UP students for its colorful wind breakers, will come into full view as you walk past the UP Press Office.

item.title: Katips-solair-ncpag
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina to School of Labor and Industrial Relations (SOLAIR) and National College of Public Administration and Governance (NCPAG)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2-Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Magsaysay Ave Gate

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building(white) on the left.

Romulo Hall Waiting Shed

Alight the jeep at Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. Go to the Romulo Hall Waiting Shed along E. Ma. Guerrero Road, then ride the next Ikot Jeep that passes by.

Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

Parish of the Holy Sacrifice

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the Parish of the Holy Sacrifice (UP Chapel).

UP Shopping Center

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

Kalayaan Residence Hall

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St. where you'll see the Kalayaan Residence Hall.

Molave Residence Hall

The jeep then turns right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay St.

Ang Bahay ng Alumni

While at Magsaysay St, you'll see the jeep pass by Ang Bahay ng Alumni.

When you reach Ylanan Hall (College of Human Kinetics) or more commonly known as the Gym, the Ikot Jeep will make a left turn to E. Jacinto St.

SOLAIR (School of Labor and Industrial Relations)

SOLAIR will be the first building you see on your right after the jeep makes a turn at E. Jacinto.

NCPAG (National College of Public Administration and Governance)

The NCPAG complex can be reached on foot from SOLAIR or you may tell the Ikot Jeep driver to take you inside the complex.



If you informed the driver prior, instead of turning left at the first corner (towards E. Jacinto St) after passing by Ylanan Hall, the jeep turns left at the second corner (past the Archery Range) going through a street that leads to the NCPAG Complex.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-solair-ncpag
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave to SOLAIR* and NCPAG**

*School of Labor and Industrial Relations
**National College of Public Administration and Governance



by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue. The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint. Cross to the other side via the pedestrian lane then walk down Emilio Jacinto St.

SOLAIR (School of Labor and Industrial Relations)



Continue walking down E. Jacinto St. until you pass the Institute of Small Scale Industries (ISSI). SOLAIR should then be visible on your left, located at the corner of E. Jacinto and R.P. De Guzman St.

NCPAG (National College of Public Administration and Governance)



If you’re going to NCPAG, turn left from SOLAIR at the intersection of E. Jacinto and R.P. De Guzman St. The NCPAG complex is at the end of the road and should be visible at this point.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-music-cmc
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to College of Mass Communication (Plaridel Hall) and College of Music (Abelardo Hall)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue. The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The Oblation Plaza

Alight from the jeep at the Oblation plaza.



The College of Mass Communication and College of Music are the last stops in the outbound route of the UP-Philcoa jeep. Walking on foot from the Oblation will take you there faster. Walk towards Osmena Ave (the Oblation'sright side). You should be going against traffic as the Academic Oval is one-way. Head towards Ylanan St.

College of Music (Abelardo Hall)

From the junction of Osmena Ave and Ylanan St., the College of Music is the building on your right.

College of Mass Communication (Plaridel Hall)

From the junction of Osmena Ave and Ylanan St., the College of Mass Communication is the building on your left.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-engg
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave to Malcolm Hall (College of Law)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue. The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval, a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

From the Oblation it will pass by the Vargas Museum.

Jeep also passes by Palma Hall as it draws closer to Vinzons Hall.

Vinzons Waiting Shed

It then turns left towards Vinzons Hall, a major transpo hub inside UP. All jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here.

School of Economics waiting shed



Alight from the jeep at the School of Economics waiting shed. Simply tell the driver to drop you off at Econ. This is the first stop after Vinzons Hall, a major transpo hub inside campus.

Malcolm Hall (College of Law)



From the Econ waiting shed, cross the Academic Oval towards Sunken Garden.

You can walk towards Malcolm Hall (now to your right), located at the corner of the Academic Oval and Guerrero St.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.description:

to College of Business Administration

and School of Economics

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue. The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval, a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

From the Oblation it will pass by the Vargas Museum.

Jeep also passes by Palma Hall as it draws closer to Vinzons Hall.

It then turns left towards Vinzons Hall, a major transpo hub inside UP. All jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here. Prepare to alight at the first stop after Vinzons.

School of Economics (Encarnacion Hall)

If you're headed to the School of Economics (Econ) alight from the jeep at the waiting shed directly in front of the building.

College of Business Administration (BA)

If you're headed to the College of Business Administration (BA), alight at the waiting shed then walk to the building beside Econ.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-cal
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

Step off from the jeep at the Faculty Center (FC) beside Vargas Museum.

Walk back in the direction of Vargas Museum then make a left turn as you reach the service road beside FC.

College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

Finally, head toward the nude female statue, Magdangal. Looming behind her is the College of Arts and Letters building.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-as
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to Palma Hall (AS) or Faculty Center (FC)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue. The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval, a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

From the Oblation it will pass by the Vargas Museum. Prepare to get off as the jeep is now very close to Palma Hall.

Palma Hall

There are waiting sheds on both sides of Palma Hall (more popularly known as AS).You may alight at the Faculty Center (FC) waiting shed near the Palma Hall east wing. Alternatively, you may also alight at the next stop located near the Palma Hall west wing.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-arki
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to College of Architecture

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue. The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval, a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

Get off from the jeep at the first intersection after the jeep turns right at the Oblation. This intersection of Roxas Ave and E. Delos Santos St is marked by a waiting shed.

No jeep route passes by the College of Architecture on weekends so you will have to complete the rest of the trip on foot.

From the waiting shed, walk along E. Delos Santos St with the Oblation statue behind you. Only a few meters ahead is another intersection. Continue walking along E. Delos Santos St toward the UP Press Office. text

College of Architecture (Arki) (

The College of Architecture, a building known to UP students for its colorful wind breakers, will come into full view as you walk past the UP Press Office.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-arki
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to College of Architecture (Arki)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Once outside, turn left, heading towards Quirino St. Turn right at Quirino St, passing by NISMED.

Continue and pass the Office of the University Registrar (OUR).

College of Architecture Buillding (Arki)

Turn right at Delos Santos St. You’ll find the College of Architecture on the left side of the road, right across the UP Diliman Police Office.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-area2
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to Area 2

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Once outside, turn left, heading towards Quirino St. Cross Quirino St. walking towards the frontage of the Natural Sciences Research Institute (NSRI). This is where you will hail an IKOT jeep.

The IKOT jeep will ply Quirino St., passing by dormitories and then turn left at Africa St. before heading right towards the Academic Oval (the sunken garden should be very visible). The jeep will then pass by Vinzons Hall (the busiest transpo hub inside the campus).

The jeep will then take the F.M. Guerrero Street, passing by Encarnacion Hall (Econ), Romulo Hall (Asian Center) and Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall.

It will turn left at Laurel St., passing by the Infirmary, Chapel and Shopping Center.

Step off the jeep at the UP COOP jeepney stop, right before it turns left to Roces St.

Turn right at Roces St. walking past the Post Office (to your left).

Area 2

The streets to your left after the Post Office comprise Area 2. The place is known for student budget-friendly food establishments and kiosks.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-alumni-center-tba-vanguard
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to the Alumni Center, Bahay ng Alumni and the Vanguard building

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Once outside, turn left, heading towards Quirino St. Cross Quirino St. walking towards the frontage of the Natural Sciences Research Institute (NSRI). This is where you will hail an IKOT jeep.

The IKOT jeep will ply Quirino St., passing by dormitories and then turn left at Africa St. before heading right towards the Academic Oval (the sunken garden should be very visible). The jeep will then pass by Vinzons Hall (the busiest transpo hub inside the campus).

It will then pass by the College of Business Administration, School of Economics and then continue on towards F.M. Ma. Guerrero St.

It will then turn left at Laurel St., passing by the Chapel, Infirmary, Shopping Center and Kalayaan Residence Hall. The jeep will then turn left at Roces St., and turn right at Magsaysay St.

You’ll then see the Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay.

Bahay ng Alumni

If you are going to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, alight the jeep after it passes by Molave. You won’t miss the building as it is aptly labeled and sits next to Molave.

Alumni Center

If you are going to the Alumni Center, alight the jeep right after it passes by Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Alumni Center is right next to Ang Bahay ng Alumni.

Vanguard Building

If you are going to the UP Vanguard, alight the jeep after it passes the intersection of Magsaysay and Ylanan Sts. You’ll immediately see the Military Science Complex. UP Vanguard is at the back of the Military Science Complex. Walk along Ylanan St. to get to the entrance of UP Vanguard.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-vinzons
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to Vinzons Hall

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, exit Palma Hall at the front of the building, the side facing the academic oval. You will walk along Roxas St. (along the part of academic oval to your right), heading towards the sunken garden.

You will walk along Roxas St., passing by Palma Hall Annex and Benitez Hall (right side). You’ll find the sunken garden on the left side of the road.

Vinzons Hall (Vinzons)

At the end of Roxas St., turn left heading towards the jeepney terminal waiting sheds. Right behind this transpo hub is Vinzons Hall.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-stat
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to the School of Statistics Building

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, exit Palma Hall at the front of the building.

Pass by the Beta Epsilon Way (Beta Way), which is located at the Palma Hall Parking Lot (right in front of Palma Hall).

This walkway connects the frontage of Palma Hall to the frontage of Melchor Hall (Engg). Once you reach the other side of Beta Way, you’ll find yourself at Osmena Ave (other side of the academic oval). Turn right at Osmena St., passing by Melchor Hall (Engg). Turn left at the first intersection, heading towards Apacible St.

School of Stat Building

Apacible St., intersects Magsaysay St. Cross Magsaysay St., while continuing on to Apacible St. The first building you’ll see on the right side of the road after crossing Magsaysay St., is the School of Statistics Building (Stat).
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-solair-ncpag
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to Bonifacio Hall (SOLAIR) and NCPAG

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Once outside, turn left, heading towards Quirino St. Turn right at Quirino St. You should be right across  NISMED. This is where you’ll hail a TOKI jeep. There aren’t too many TOKI jeeps in campus compared to the IKOT jeeps, so wait patiently.

The jeep will ply Quirino St., passing by the Office of the University Registrar (OUR), then turn right at Delos Santos St., before turning left again at Lakandula St.

The jeep will then turn right at Jacinto St., and cross the University Avenue (very wide road), continuing on to the other side of Jacinto St.

Bonifacio Hall (SOLAIR)

Bonifacio Hall (SOLAIR) will be the first building you see on your right after the jeep makes a turn at E. Jacinto.

NCPAG

TIf you are going to the NCPAG Building, step off the jeep when it reaches the first building to your right (this is the School of Urban and Regional Planning or SURP). Cross Jacinto St., heading towards R. P. De Guzman St. You’ll see the Institute of Small Scale Industries (Virata Hall) on the left side. Right behind it is the NCPAG Building.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-sci-complex
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to the National Science Complex (Math, NIP, IC, MBB, IB)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Catch the TOKI jeep at the jeepney stop in front of the rightmost part of Palma Hall (if you’re facing the academic oval).

The jeep will pass by the Palma Hall Annex (PHAN) and Benitez Hall (Educ) before turning right to Ma. Regidor St.

The TOKI jeep will turn right at A. Ma. Regidor St., passing by the new UP Integrated School and the College of Home Economics (Alonso Hall)

The jeep will then ply A. Ma. Regidor St., passing by the PAGASA Observatory (dome-shaped structure uphill).

Institute of Biology (IB)

If you are going to the Institute of Biology (IB), prepare to step off the jeepney as it enters the National Science Complex. You’ll see the IB building on the right side of the road.

Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBB)

If you are going to the Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBB), prepare to step off the jeepney as it enters the National Science Complex. You’ll see the MBB building on the left side of the street, just across IB.

Institute of Chemistry (IC)

If you are going to the Institute of Chemistry (IC), stay at the TOKI jeep as it continues plying Ma. Regidor St., turning left towards the IC building passing by the front-side of MBB.

National Institute of Physics (NIP)

If you are going to the  National Institute of Physics (NIP), stay at the TOKI jeep as it continues towards the end of Ma. Regidor St., stopping at the NIP jeepney stop before it exits the campus proceeding to C.P. Garcia Ave.

Math Building

If you are going to the Math Building, step off the jeep at the jeepney stop after NIP, located along C.P. Garcia Ave. The Math Building is just behind the jeepney stop.
item.dc:creator: RK

The IKOT jeep will ply Quirino St., passing by dormitories and then turn left at Africa St. before heading right towards the Academic Oval (the sunken garden should be very visible). The jeep will then pass by Vinzons Hall (the busiest transpo hub inside the campus).

The jeep will then take the F.M. Guerrero Street, passing by Encarnacion Hall (Econ), Romulo Hall (Asian Center) and Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall. It will turn left at Laurel St.

UP Shopping Center (SC)

You will find the Shopping Center (SC) at the right side of the road, right after the jeep passes by the University Health Service (Infirmary) which is on the right side also.

You’ll pass by the whole stretch of the Faculty Center (FC) to your left and the Vargas Museum.

Oblation Plaza and Quezon Hall

Turn right at the end of Roxas St, heading towards the University Ave. On the right side of the road is the Oblation Plaza (Oble) and the building looming behind it is Quezon Hall.

to the National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS) , Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM) and College of Science Library (CS Lib)

Cross Quirino St. to get to Velasquez St.

College of Science Library (CS Lib)

The College of Science Library (CS Lib)  is on the left side of the road, right across Triple E.

National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS)

Right next to the CS Lib is the National Institute of Geological Science (NIGS).

Behind NIGS is the Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology Building (IESM).

You will walk along Roxas St. (along the part of academic oval to your right), heading towards Palma Hall jeepney stop.

Gonzalez Hall (Main Lib)

Once you reach the jeepney stop, cross the street, going towards the covered walkway near the food kiosks. The building you’re approaching is Gonzalez Hall (Main Lib).

The Kalayaan Residence Hall

The Kalayaan Residence Hall is right next to Yakal Residence Hall (right side of the road).

The jeep will then turn right at Jacinto St., and cross the University Avenue (very wide road), continuing on to the other side of Jacinto St.

School of Urban and Regional Planning

The first building on the right side of the road that you’ll see after the jeep crosses the University Ave is the School of Urban and Regional Planning (SURP).

Virata Hall

The first building on the left side of the road that you’ll see after the jeep crosses the University Ave is Virata Hall (ISSI).

Pass by the Beta Epsilon Way (Beta Way), which is located at the Palma Hall Parking Lot (right in front of Palma Hall).

This walkway connects the frontage of Palma Hall to the frontage of Melchor Hall (Engg).

Once you reach the other side of Beta Way, you’ll find yourself at Osmena Ave (other side of the academic oval).  Turn left and continue walking past the Tennis Court (right side), the UP Carillon, and the University Theater.

Abelardo Hall

The building right next to the University Theater is Abelardo Hall (Music).

Abelardo Hall

The building right next to Music is Plaridel Hall (Mass Com).

The jeep will pass by the Palma Hall Annex (PHAN) and Benitez Hall (Educ) before turning right to Ma. Regidor St.

The first building you’ll see on the left side of the road as you enter Ma. Regidor St. is UP Integrated School (UP IS).

Alonso Hall (HE)

The Alonso Hall (HE) is right next to UP IS.

The Parish of the Holy Sacrifice

to CASAA

CASAA

You’ll see CASAA right at the center of Fernandez St.

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, exit Palma Hall at the front of the building, the side facing the academic oval. You will walk along Roxas St. (along the part of academic oval to your right), heading towards the sunken garden.

Palma Hall Annex (PHAN)

The Palma Hall Annex (PHAN) is the building next to AS (on your right side).

Benitez Hall (educ)

The Benitez Hall (Educ) is the building next to PHAN (right side also).

Ylanan Hall (Gym)

Step off the jeep right after it turns right again at Magsaysay St. The gym is across the street. It’s not exactly sitting along the road but you should see it from the street. You have to walk towards the slightly uphill street to your right to get to the entrance.

to the UP Film Center and UP Theater

You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St., and turn right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay.

Film Institute

If you are going to UP Film Institute, alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Ang Bahay ng Alumni is on the same side of the road you’re in. Cross the street to get to the UP Film Institute. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Film Institute is at your 11 o’clock.

UP Theater

If you are going to UP Theater, alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Ang Bahay ng Alumni is on the same side of the road you’re in. Cross the street to get to the UP Theater. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Theater is at your 1 o’clock.

to the College of Fine Arts

Fine Arts

item.title: Palma-engg
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to the College of Engineering

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, exit Palma Hall at the front of the building. Melchor Hall is on the exact opposite side of Palma Hall, on the other side of the academic oval.

You only have to pass by the Beta Epsilon Way (Beta Way), which is located at the Palma Hall Parking Lot (right in front of Palma Hall).

Melchor Hall

Betaway connects the frontage of Palma Hall to the frontage of Melchor Hall (Engg).
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-cal
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to the College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Head towards the parking lot of the Faculty Center (right where the Landbank ATM is, should be visible from where the vendors are). You’ll walk past the whole stretch of the rear side of Faculty Center.

College of Arts and Letters (CAL)

The first building you’ll see on the left side is the College of Arts and Letters (CAL).
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-ba-econ
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to College of Business Administration and Encarnacion Hall (econ)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Once outside, turn left, heading towards Quirino St. Cross Quirino St. walking towards the frontage of the Natural Sciences Research Institute (NSRI). This is where you will hail an IKOT jeep.

.

The IKOt jeep will ply Quirino St., passing by dormitories and then turn left at Africa St. before heading right towards the Academic Oval (the sunken garden should be very visible). The jeep will then pass by Vinzons Hall (the busiest transpo hub inside the campus).

College of Business Administration

If you are going to the College of Business Administration, turn right once you reach the end of Osmena St., this will bring you closer to the Sunken Garden. You will pass by the School of Economics (Encarnacion Hall). The building next to it is the College of Business Administration (BA).

School of Economics (Econ)

If you are going to the School of Economics (Econ), step off the jeep at the next stop after Vinzons Hall. Right behind this jeepney stop is the School of Economics.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Palma-romulo-gt-toyota
item.description:
Palma Hall (AS)

to Romulo Hall and GT-Toyota Asian Cultural Center

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

If you’re at Palma Hall (more commonly known as AS) and you’re facing the academic oval, walk the corridor towards your left, heading to the side entrance/exit of AS towards the Faculty Center. You will go down a flight of stairs, heading towards a covered walkway, where you’ll normally see street vendors selling banana cue, taho, monay etc.  

Once outside, turn left, heading towards Quirino St. Cross Quirino St. walking towards the frontage of the Natural Sciences Research Institute (NSRI). This is where you will hail an IKOT jeep.

.

The jeep will ply Quirino St., passing by dormitories and then turn left at Africa St. before heading right towards the Academic Oval (the sunken garden should be very visible). The jeep will then pass by Vinzons Hall (the busiest transpo hub inside the campus)

It will then pass by the College of Business Administration, School of Economics and then continue on towards F.M. Ma. Guerrero St.

Romulo Hall

Romulo Hall is the building at the corner of Magsaysay St. and F.M. Guerrero St., opposite Bocobo Hall.

GT-Toyota Asian Cultural Center

If you are going to GT-Toyota Asian Cultural Center, continue walking along Magsaysay St., towards the campus gate going to Katipunan Ave. The GT Toyota Building is that white building nearest the Magsaysay Gate.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Katips-stat
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina

to School of Statistics Building

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2-Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Magsaysay Ave Gate

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building (white) on the left.

Romulo Hall

Alight the jeep at Romulo Hall. This is located at the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP.

School of Statistics Building (Stat)

Walk straight along Magsaysay St., passing by Bocobo Hall (to your left). The first building you’ll see on the right side of the road is the School of Statistics Building (Stat).
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Katips-sci-complex
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina

to National Science Complex

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2-Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Katipunan to HE Footbridge

Step off the jeep at the foot bridge along Katipunan Avenue connecting the old UP Integrated School compound to the main campus. There is a lesser known pedestrian entrance here marked by a guard house. Cross the foot bridge, go through the pedestrian entrance.

Alonso Hall (College of Home Economics)

You’ll be passing by Alonso Hall (College of Home Economics) (to your left) and the new UP Integrated School (to your right). Walk along this street until you reach its intersection with Ma. Regidor St. Cross Ma. Regidor St and wait for a TOKI jeep.

PAGASA Observatory

The jeep will also pass by the PAGASA Observatory (dome-shaped structure uphill).

Institute of Biology (IB)

If you are going to the Institute of Biology (IB), prepare to step off the jeepney as it enters the National Science Complex. You’ll see the IB building on the right side of the road while the MBB building is found on the left side of the street, just across IB.

Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBB)

If you are going to Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBB), prepare to step off the jeepney as it enters the National Science Complex. You’ll see the IB building on the right side of the road while the MBB building is found on the left side of the street, just across IB.

Institute of Chemistry (IC)

If you are going to the Institute of Chemistry (IC), stay at the TOKI jeep as it continues plying Ma. Regidor St., turning left towards the IC building passing by the front-side of MBB.

National Institute of Physics (NIP)

If you are going to the National Institute of Physics (NIP), stay at the TOKI jeep as it continues towards the end of Ma. Regidor St., stopping at the NIP jeepney stop before it exits the campus proceeding to C.P. Garcia Ave.

Institute of Mathematics (Math)

If you are going to the Math Building, step off the jeep at the jeepney stop after NIP, located along C.P. Garcia Ave. The Math Building is just behind the jeepney stop.

Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

You will then find the UP Shopping Center (SC) at the right side of the road.

item.description:

to Palma Hall Annex (PHAN) and Benitez Hall (Educ)

College of Home Economics (HE) Footbridge

UP Integrated School (UPIS)

You’ll pass by the new UP Integrated School building (on your right).

College of Home Economics (HE)

The College of Home Economics is on your left. Turn right at the Africa St. (second corner).

Benitez Hall (Educ)

At the end of Africa St., you’ll find Benitez Hall (Educ) on the right side of the road.

Palma Hall Annex (PHAN)

Palma Hall Annex (PHAN) is right across Benitez Hall (Educ), at the left side of the road.

Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

Parish of the Holy Sacrifice

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

UP Shopping Center

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

Kalayaan Residence Hall

You'll then see Kalayaan Residence Hall along Roces St.

Yakal Residence Hall

You'll also pass by the side of Yakal Residence Hall.

Melchor Hall (Engg)

The jeep will also pass by the side of Melchor Hall (College of Engineering) before turning right at Osmena Ave.

Carillon

The jeep will also pass by notable UP landmarks such as the UP Carillon.

Oblation Plaza and Quezon Hall

The jeep then turns left as it heads towards the Oblation Plaza where Quezon Hall and the iconic Oblation statue (called Oble) is. You won’t miss it as the University Ave ends here.
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Katips-nigs-iesm-cs-lib
item.description:
From Katipunan or Marikina

to National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS), Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM) and College of Science Library (CS Lib)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

Marikina

From Marikina, alight at Aurora Blvd corner Katipunan and walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

LRT2 - Katipunan

If you’re coming from the LRT-2 Katipunan Station, take the North Exit on the same side as St. Bridget, opposite PSBA. Walk towards the jeepney terminal under the Katipunan Flyover.

Katipunan Jeepney Terminal

There are two queues calling UP at the terminal. Make sure you ride the jeep which goes inside the campus (the jeep line closer to Ministop). The other jeep line (farther from Ministop) goes to Tandang Sora passing through MWSS and will not go inside UP. To be sure, ask the jeepney barker before boarding.

Magsaysay Ave Gate

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS.

GT-Toyota

Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building (white) on the left.

Romulo Hall Waiting Shed

Alight the jeep at Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. Go to the Romulo Hall Waiting Shed along E. Ma. Guerrero Road, then ride the next Ikot Jeep that passes by.

Ilang-ilang Residence Hall

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the IKOt jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

Parish of the Holy Sacrifice (UP Chapel)

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

UP Shopping Center

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

Kalayaan Residence Hall

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St. where you'll see the Kalayaan Residence Hall.

Molave Residence Hall

The jeep then turns right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay St.

Ang Bahay ng Alumni

While at Magsaysay St, you'll see the jeep pass by Ang Bahay ng Alumni.

Virata Hall (ISSI)

It will then turn left at Jacinto St., passing by Virata Hall (ISSI).

University Avenue

The jeep will then cross the University Avenue, past the checkpoint, continuing on to Jacinto St. Do not fret when the jeep exits the main campus and coasts along C.P. Garcia Avenue. This is a typical part of its route.

Velasquez Gate

The jeep re-enters the campus at Velasquez Gate.

National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS)

The National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS) will be the first building you will see on the right as the Ikot jeep re-enters the campus. The building has an orange brick exterior. Step off at the nearest waiting shed/jeepney stop.

College of Science Library (CS Lib)

The College of Science Library (CS Lib) is just behind the jeepney stop. If you are facing NIGS, this is the building to your left.

Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM)

The Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM) can be found at the back of NIGS.

Palma Hall (AS)

The building you’re approaching is Gonzalez Hall (Main Lib).

The UP-Katipunan jeep enters UP Diliman through the gate opposite MWSS (Manila Water). Upon entry to UP, you'll see the GT Toyota Building(white) on the left.

Alight the jeep at Romulo Hall. This is the first intersection the UP-Katipunan jeep encounters once inside UP. Go to the Romulo Hall Waiting Shed along E. Ma. Guerrero Road, then ride the next Ikot Jeep that passes by.

While at E. Ma. Guerrero St., the IKOt jeep will pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St. where you'll see the Kalayaan Residence Hall.

The jeep then turns right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay St.

UP Film Institute (FI)

If you are going to UP Film Institute, alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Ang Bahay ng Alumni is on the same side of the road you’re in. Cross the street to get to the UP Film Institute. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Film Institute is at your 11 o’clock.

UP Theater

If you are going to UP Theater, alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Ang Bahay ng Alumni is on the same side of the road you’re in. Cross the street to get to the UP Theater. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Theater is at your 1 o’clock.

item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-vinzons
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to Vinzons Hall

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

The jeep will continue navigating the Academic Oval, passing by notable academic buildings such as Palma Hall (AS).

The jeep will also pass by Benitez Hall (Educ) before turning left towards Vinzons Hall.

Vinzons Hall

Step off from the jeep at the line of waiting sheds in front of Vinzons Hall, the next stop after the jeep passes by Educ. Vinzons is a major transpo hub inside UP as all jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here.

to School of Statistics Building

by DiliMaps

The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

The jeep will continue navigating the Academic Oval, passing by notable academic buildings such as Palma Hall (AS).

The jeep will also pass by Benitez Hall (Educ) before it heads to Vinzons Hall.

The jeep will also pass by Vinzons Hall. Vinzons is a major transpo hub inside UP as all jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here.

The jeep will continue towards F.M. Guerrero St., passing by the College of Business Administration Building (CBA).

It will also pass by Encarnacion Hall (Econ).

Step off the Romulo Hall jeepney stop which is next to the Econ stop. Cross F.M. Guerrero St., heading towards Magsaysay St. Continue walking along Magsaysay St., passing by Bocobo Hall (to your left).

School of Statistics Building (Stat)

The first building you’ll see on the right side of the road is the School of Statistics Building (Stat).
item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-sci-complex
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to National Science Complex

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

The jeep will continue navigating the Academic Oval, passing by notable academic buildings such as Palma Hall (AS).

Step off the jeep at the Palma Hall Annex jeepney stop and switch to the TOKI jeep.

The jeep will pass by Benitez Hall(Educ) before turning right at A. Ma. Regidor St.

While at A. Ma. Regidor St., the jeep will pass by the new UP Integrated School and the College of Home Economics (Alonso Hall).

The jeep will also pass by the PAGASA Observatory (dome-shaped structure uphill).

Institute of Biology (IB)

If you are going to the Institute of Biology (IB), prepare to step off the jeepney as it enters the National Science Complex. You’ll see the IB building on the right side of the road while the MBB building is found on the left side of the street, just across IB.

Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBB)

If you are going to Molecular Biology and Biotechnology (MBB), prepare to step off the jeepney as it enters the National Science Complex. You’ll see the IB building on the right side of the road while the MBB building is found on the left side of the street, just across IB.

Institute of Chemistry (IC)

If you are going to the Institute of Chemistry (IC), stay at the TOKI jeep as it continues plying Ma. Regidor St., turning left towards the IC building passing by the front-side of MBB.

National Institute of Physics (NIP)

If you are going to the National Institute of Physics (NIP), stay at the TOKI jeep as it continues towards the end of Ma. Regidor St., stopping at the NIP jeepney stop before it exits the campus proceeding to C.P. Garcia Ave.

Institute of Mathematics (Math)

If you are going to the Math Building, step off the jeep at the jeepney stop after NIP, located along C.P. Garcia Ave. The Math Building is just behind the jeepney stop.

to UP Film Institute (FI) and UP Theater

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

You'll also pass by Vinzons Hall. Vinzons is a major transpo hub inside UP as all jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here.

Along F. M. Guerrero St., the jeep will pass by Romulo Hall (Asian Center).

It will also pass by Ilang-Ilang Residence Hall before turning left at Laurel St.

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

UP Shopping Center (SC)

You will find the Shopping Center (SC) at the right side of the road, right after the jeep passes by the University Health Service (Infirmary) which is on the right side also.

item.dc:creator: RK

item.title: Philcoa-nigs-iesm-cs-lib
item.description:
From Philcoa/SM North/Quezon Ave

to National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS), Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM) and College of Science Library (CS Lib)

by DiliMaps

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint. Get off at the Checkpoint. You should find yourself at the corner of University Avenue and Jacinto St.

Wait for an Ikot Jeep at the waiting shed along Emilio Jacinto St. The Ikot Jeep has a yellow color motif. Do not fret when the jeep exits the main campus via C.P. Garcia Avenue. This is a typical part of its route.

The jeep re-enters the campus at Velasquez Gate.

National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS)

The National Institute of Geological Sciences (NIGS) will be the first building you will see on the right as the Ikot jeep re-enters the campus. The building has an orange brick exterior. Step off at the nearest waiting shed/jeepney stop.

College of Science Library (CS Lib)

The College of Science Library (CS Lib) is just behind the jeepney stop. If you are facing NIGS, this is the building to your left.

Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM)

The Institute of Environmental Science and Meteorology (IESM) can be found at the back of NIGS.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

Cross to the other side of the University Ave via the pedestrian lane then continue walking along Emilio Jacinto St.

The jeep then heads towards the Oblation Plaza until it reaches the Academic Oval , a one-way busy thoroughfare lined by lots of huge Acacia trees.

Step off from the jeep at the line of waiting sheds in front of Vinzons Hall. Vinzons is a major transpo hub inside UP as all jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here. You have to transfer to the IKOT jeep at Vinzons.

You will also see the UP Shopping Center along Laurel St.

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St. where you'll see the Kalayaan Residence Hall.

The jeep then turns right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay St.

Ylanan Hall (Gym)

If you are going to UP Film Institute, alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Ang Bahay ng Alumni is on the same side of the road you’re in. Cross the street to get to the UP Film Institute. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Film Institute is at your 11 o’clock.

UP Theater

If you are going to UP Theater, alight from the jeep when it reaches Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Ang Bahay ng Alumni is on the same side of the road you’re in. Cross the street to get to the UP Theater. If you’re facing the other side of the road and your back is to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, UP Theater is at your 1 o’clock.

to Fine Arts (FA)

Scroll ▼

The jeep enters UP Diliman through the University Avenue.



The first landmark you'll see is the checkpoint. This is quite noticeable as all vehicles slowdown at the guard house near the checkpoint. Alight the jeep right after it passes the checkpoint. You should be at University Ave cor Jacinto St.

If you don’t like walking, proceed to the nearest waiting shed along Jacinto St where you will take a short IKOT jeep ride. Normally, there are no jeep queues here so just wait for the next jeep to arrive if you don’t see any.

Fine Arts (FA)

Alight the Ikot jeep right after it passes Jacinto cor Lakandula (first intersection). The College of Fine Arts Building is on the same side of the road the jeep is on.
If you prefer walking, the College of Fine Arts is a 10-minute walk along Jacinto St., from the jeepney stop near the checkpoint.

Step off from the jeep at the line of waiting sheds in front of Vinzons Hall. Vinzons is a major transpo hub inside UP as all jeepney routes pass by this area. The UP Sunken Garden is visible from here. You have to transfer to the IKOT jeep at Vinzons.

While at Laurel St., the jeep passes by the UP Chapel.

The jeep will then turn left at Roces St. where you'll see Kalayaan Residence Hall.

The jeep then turns right at Magsaysay St. You’ll see Molave Residence Hall at Roces cor Magsaysay St.

Bahay ng Alumni

If you are going to Ang Bahay ng Alumni, alight the jeep after it passes by Molave. You won’t miss the building as it is aptly labeled and sits next to Molave.

Alumni Center

If you are going to the Alumni Center, alight the jeep right after it passes by Ang Bahay ng Alumni. Alumni Center is right next to Ang Bahay ng Alumni.

UP Vanguard

If you are going to the UP Vanguard, alight the jeep after it passes the intersection of Magsaysay and Ylanan Sts. You’ll immediately see the DMST Quadrangle. UP Vanguard Building is at the back of DMST Quadrangle. Walk along Ylanan St. to get to the entrance of UP Vanguard Building.

The IKOT jeep will then turn right at Magsaysay St., where you’ll see the Bahay ng Alumni, Alumni Center, UP Film Institute, UP Theater, Tandang Sora Hall (CSWCD). It will then turn left at Jacinto St. and cross the University Avenue, continuing on to Jacinto St.

Bonifacio Hall (SOLAIR)

Bonifacio Hall (SOLAIR) will be the first building you see on your right after the jeep makes a turn at E. Jacinto.

NCPAG

The NCPAG complex can be reached on foot from SOLAIR or you may tell the Ikot Jeep driver to take you inside the complex. If you informed the driver prior, instead of turning left at the first corner (towards E. Jacinto St) after passing by Ylanan Hall, the jeep turns left at the second corner (past the Archery Range) going through a street that leads to the NCPAG Complex.

.

GT-Toyota Asian Cultural Center

If you are going to GT-Toyota Asian Cultural Center, continue walking along Magsaysay St., towards the campus gate going to Katipunan Ave. The GT Toyota Building is that white building nearest the Magsaysay Gate.

Benitez Hall (educ)

Benitez Hall is the building after Palma Hall Annex (right side), located at the end of Roxas St. The Sunken Garden is very much visible from here.

Abelardo Hall

If you are going to Abelardo Hall, just cross Magsaysay St. and you will find yourself at Abelardo Hall’s (Music) rear side. Enter the building via the side or front entrances.

Abelardo Hall

If you are going to Plaridel Hall (Mass Com), cross Magsaysay St. and walk along Ylanan St., passing by the Dance Studio on your right. Plaridel Hall (Mass Com) is the building next to the Dance Studio.

If you’re standing right at the intersection of Roces St. and Roxas St., the building to your right is Faculty Center (FC) while the building to your left is Palma Hall (AS).

.
